projects.description: Are you looking for motivation?  Do you need encouragement to finish your goals and dreams?  Well check out this simple random motivational quote generator showcasing the absolute best life quotes about never giving up.  Quotes are randomly displayed every 10 seconds or when you press the motivate! button.  Enjoy!
Given a list of students, this application dynamically paginates the list of students.  Ten students are displayed at a time and the remaining students are accessible via page links.
When a customer is checking out, they typically have various field inputs such as credit card, name, email and more.  This application validates user input dynamically upon clicking submit.
Want to test your 80s knowledge?  Well you can with this 1980s Pop Culture Hangman game.  This game functions on the paradigm of Object Oriented Programming.
An employee directory is created asyncronously by requesting data from a public API using AJAX.
This is a backend webpage created to showcase projects.  If you're curious about this project, it's the one you're currently using.
